title: Pakistan International Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade Unions and Existing Agreements) Order (Repeal) Act, 2008
title_en: Pakistan International Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade Unions and Existing Agreements) Order (Repeal) Act, 2008
description: Official consolidated text of Pakistan International Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade Unions and Existing Agreements) Order (Repeal) Act, 2008 (II of 2008) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and commencement
provisions.content:
_ (1) This Act may be called the Pakistan International
Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade Unions and Existing Agreements) Order (Repeal) Act,

provisions.title: Section 2. Repeal of the Pakistan International Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade
provisions.content:
Unions and Existing Agreements) Order, 2001 (C.E's Order No. 6 of 2001).___(1) The Pakistan
International Airline Corporation (Suspension of Trade Unions and Existing Agreements) Order
2001, (C.E's Order No. 6 of 2001) is hereby repealed:
Provided that the trade unions, associations, organizations or groups of any type of employees
suspended under the aforesaid Order shall be registered afresh in accordance with law.
(2) Notwithstanding the repeal of the C. E's Order No. 6 of 2001, and without prejudice to
orders issued, actions taken and modifications made in settlements shall continue in force until altered
or rescinded.
________
RGN Dated: 12-03-2025
